column4: I'm on Ubuntu, and apparently my sound card wasn't found. I'm reading the forums.. and lots of them seem to be directing to something of "alsaconf." I've tried that, but here is what I get: bash: alsaconf: command not found (I tried apt-get install alsaconf, but it says "alsa-utils is already the newest version." to that) Any help and I'd be greatly grateful :x
uname -r for kernel version, -A I think for all
